alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Cobb; DeKalb; Fayette; Henry; North Fulton; South Fulton; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Spalding, southwestern DeKalb, eastern Fayette, southeastern Cobb, western Henry, south central Fulton and Clayton Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Fayetteville, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Douglasville, Griffin, Decatur, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, City of South Fulton, Smyrna, East Point, Stockbridge, Union City, Forest Park, Riverdale, College Park, Fairburn, Hampton, Morrow, Lovejoy, Hapeville, and Avondale Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; Cobb; DeKalb; Fayette; Henry; North Fulton; South Fulton; Spalding
